module.name: Localization
module.description: Localization module is created for one purpose, to help manage single id and multi language content. For example: I have product catalog module. Products have to be single id, but also have to be translated. This was a problem within Fork CMS. Every content goes different per language and this is bad for such kind of module like catalog, services or others where single records should persist with same id. For module to work modules below is required: * Entities
